data.title: Dolly Parton's Imagination Library

data.text:
Allegany County Welcomes Dolly Parton's Imagination Library

How can I sign my child up for the Dolly Parton Imagination Library?

Allegany County children from birth through their 5th birthday are eligible to receive free monthly books in the mail from Dolly Parton's Imagination Library. Registering can be completed:

Online at Check Availability - Dolly Parton's Imagination Library. Add your mailing address to the form to be directed to Allegany County's page. Then add your child's information to the registration page. Submit the form, and wait for your child's smile when he/she receives his/her first book.

If you have more than one child under age 5, complete the process for each child.

Don't have a computer? No problem. Call Robin Fuller at 585-648-6022 and enroll over the phone.

2022 Annual Report

Not sure if your child and family will enjoy Dolly Parton Imagination Library? See what other parents are saying in our Dolly Parton Imagination Library 2022 Annual Report below.

2022_dpil_annual_report.pdfFile Size: 2026 kbFile Type: pdf

Download File

Fun Family Activities

Click on the pictures below to find fun activities to do with your child while reading this month's book. Libraries, schools, daycares, and other children's programs are encouraged to reinforce lessons by reading the books and using the activities as well. Remember... reading a book over and over is important for a child's development.
